_header: Worshipful sir and our friend special
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, ‘La Court de bone compaignie’, to Henry Somer — ten stanzas rhyme royal

HunHM111.First Lines:
Worsshipful sir and our freend specialAnd felawe in this cas we
                    call yow…
HunHM111.Last Lines:
…But keepith wel your tourne how so befallOn thorsday next on
                    which we awayte all
HunHM111.Attributed Title:
Ceste balade ensuyante feust par la Court de bone compaignie enuoiee a
                        lonure sire Henri Sommer Chaunceller de leschequer & vn de la dicte
                        Court (f. 41v)
